## DARWHIN GOMEZ  
New York, New York | 347-491-2955  
Darwhin88@gmail.com | [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/darwhin) | [GitHub](https://github.com/dw8888)  

---  

### CERTIFICATIONS  
- AWS Certified Solutions Architect – Associate  
- AWS Certified AI Practitioner – Generative AI  
- Google Cybersecurity Certificate

Master of Science - Data Science and Machine Learning, GPA 4.0, Expected Jan 2026  
**City University of New York – New York City College of Technology**  
Bachelor of Technology - Computer Information Systems, GPA 3.78, June 2024  
Dean’s List (8x), National Honor Society  

### PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE  
**Solutions Architect Intern - Amazon Web Services (AWS)**  
Arlington, VA (Remote/Hybrid)  
Jun 2025 – Sep 2025  
- Designed and presented secure, scalable AWS architectures tailored to enterprise client needs.  
- Developed proof-of-concept (POC) solutions integrating Generative AI, data analytics, and serverless computing to discover actionable business insights.  
- Built and deployed a fully automated sentiment analysis pipeline processing over 1M feedback records, enabling faster feedback-to-action turnaround through real-time dashboards.  
- Fine-tuned foundational models in Amazon SageMaker using instruction training, achieving a 5% increase in output accuracy and a reduction in toxicity.  

**Software Developer Intern - WOPLLI Technologies**  
Remote, NY  
Jun 2024 – Sep 2024  
- Designed Virtual Credential System for decentralized identity ecosystems.  
- Configured and tested Azure environments for application hosting and deployment.  
- Produced data flow and architecture diagrams aligned with data governance policies.  

**IT Support Intern - Mayor’s Office of Information Services**  
New York, NY  
Feb 2024 – May 2024  
- Automated troubleshooting with Python scripts, reducing manual workload.  
- Supported VIP users, ensuring secure system access.  

**IT Instructor Assistant - RF CUNY & Generation USA (Choose-U)**  
Remote, NY  
Feb 2022 – Aug 2023  
- Delivered lessons on IT support, Linux, PowerShell, and scripting for 200+ learners.  
- Achieved a 96% cohort graduation rate by tailoring instruction with learner data insights.  

### TECHNICAL PROJECTS  
**Alfred: Personal Agentic Job Search Assistant**  
- Designed and developed a personal agentic job search assistant using FastAPI and OpenAI GPT-4.1 Mini for automated resume and cover letter generation.  
- Implemented a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system using a PostgreSQL database to store and retrieve personal work data as embeddings.  
- Established a CI/CD pipeline and Docker deployment for the FastAPI server and database.  
- Built GitHub ingestions and job board API integrations for posting and fetching jobs.  

### TECHNICAL EXPERTISE  
- **Cloud:** AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda, RDS, DynamoDB, Glue, QuickSight, Bedrock, SageMaker)  
- **Data & ML:** Python, SQL, NoSQL, Regression, Classifications
